appDescription.message: Copy, paste and translate text from any image, video or PDF.

captureError.description: If page load is not yet done, throw an error
captureError.message:
Unable to OCR PROJECT, please try again when is loaded. 
Do you want to capture the desktop instead?

ocrDimensionError.message: The parameter is incorrect.Image size is not supported. Each image dimension must be between 40 and 2600 pixels.

permWarning.description: Error message when user denies permission
permWarning.message: Please grant permission to use this feature

screenCapture.description: Title of the screen capture page

screenCaptureNotify.description: Click on the extension icon to begin selection
screenCaptureNotify.message: Click on the extension icon to begin selection.

userMediaUnsupported.message: Your browser does not support desktop capture

captureNotAvailable.description: If this message does not disappear, try reloading the page.
captureNotAvailable.message: If this message does not disappear, try reloading the page.

nativeAppNotSupported.description: The desktop screen capture helper is not yet installed. This free helper app is required as the browser extension alone can not take desktop screenshots.
nativeAppNotSupported.message: The desktop screen capture helper is not yet installed. This free helper app is required as the browser extension alone can not take desktop screenshots.
